description:
ReaPack is a package manager for REAPER, the Digital Audio Workstation.

Discover, install and keep up to date your REAPER resources including ReaScripts, JS effects, extensions, themes, language packs, templates, web interfaces and more.

## Package parameters
- `/ReaperResourcePath` - Reaper resource path, by default %APPDATA%\Reaper.
Example: `choco install reapack --params "/ReaperResourcePath:C:\your\reaper\resources"`

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: ReaPack is a package manager for REAPER, the Digital Audio Workstation.
author: Christian Fillion
